title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not selected. To reproduce the issue, make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar. Then, follow these steps: Open java.io.File, select the field 'tmpFir', and perform the search.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the corresponding match should be selected.
SR: 1. Set JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE and ensure you have the source for rt.jar available. 2. Open java.io.File. 3. Select the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Perform a search for references to the selected field.
